vote.text: Amendment SA 2868 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2868 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR 9/21/2012 S6673; text: CR 9/21/2012 S6673) To amend the title.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2868 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Rockefeller.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2868 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
